examples.korean: He nudged the conversation towards the subject of money. 발음듣기 그가 대화를 슬슬 돈 문제로 몰아갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He nudged the conversation towards the subject of money. 발음

examples.korean: Mistakes were starting to creep in. 발음듣기 실수들이 슬슬 생기기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mistakes were starting to creep in. 발음

examples.korean: John jerked out that he was nearly eighty years old. 발음듣기 이야기를 하던 도중 존은 자기가 슬슬 80이 된다고, 은근히 말했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: John jerked out that he was nearly eighty years old. 발음

examples.korean: We must be jogging. 발음듣기 이제 그만 슬슬 가 봅시다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
